about_the_game:
Features

  • Planting Rice
  • Planting Vegetables
    Spring Onion, Cabbage, Pepper, Lemon, Cucumber
  • Shop
    Trading
  • Status
    Hunger, Life
  • Item
    Hoe, Watering Can, Sickle, Fishing Rod
  • Time
    Day Night
  • Season
    Summer, Rainy Season, Winter
  • Environment
    Soil, Grass, Bush, Tree, Banana Tree, "Wooden Fence, Swamp, Bamboo, Cloud, Butterfly, Firefly
  • Mini Game
    Fishing, Calabash Crab Fish
  • Living things
    Chicken
  • Sound
    Music, Ambiance, SFX

short_description: As the days passed, the family age became more. Therefore the land will be given. which will make you earn rewards each day and live in a house style.
